subject: Physical Fitness
title: Yoga's Ancient Origins
description: Learn Yoga's Ancient Origins in one minute.

hook.text: Yoga is 5,000 years old. But the physical practice most people know today is barely 100.

buildup.text: Original yoga was primarily meditation and breathing. The Yoga Sutras barely mention physical postures.

discovery.text: The physical asana practice exploded in the early 1900s when Indian teachers blended yoga with gymnastics.

twist.text: Krishnamacharya, the father of modern yoga, was influenced by British military calisthenics and Danish gymnastics.

climax.text: Modern power yoga and vinyasa flows are hybrids â€” ancient philosophy meeting 20th-century fitness culture.

punchline.text: Yoga's philosophy is ancient. Its physical form is surprisingly modern.

quiz.question: What influenced the physical practice of modern yoga?
options: British military calisthenics and Danish gymnastics
